Package controllers

Interface Directory

All Known Implementing Classes:
Lookup
public interface Directory
Represents a controller class that controls the relationships between entities. This class holds only the ids of entities and stores their links. This controller is responsible for linking, delinking, and querying ids based off each other.

    Adds a new entity's id to the database.
